attributes.action: provide VAT relief on petrol and deisel fuel purchased for use in vehicles owned or driven by disabled persons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Relief from VAT is already available on items considered necessary for mobility and ease of disability problems. Disabled people rely on their vehicles as an essential item in managing their problems. The ever increasing cost of fuel is effectivly further restricting their mobility and hence their quality of life

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
